title: Cricket T20 World Cup Schedule (2016) - Sri Lanka Time
abstract: This is the Sri Lankan match schedule for the T20 Cricket World Cup, 2015, held in India.
author: indi
content:
This is the Sri Lankan match schedule for the T20 Cricket World Cup, 2015, held in India. The timings are great for us.
The tournament starts with the associate nations fighting for a spot with the big boys. Then those 10 teams fight for 4 places in the semifinals (2 in each bracket). Then one winner emerges.
Wherein the Associate teams battle it out for two spots in Round 2
The proper contests. Sri Lanka matches on the 17th, 20th, 26th and 28th. Ten teams enter, four teams advance.
You can always stand outside a TV showroom, but if you have a TV you can catch the match on Star Sports (Dialog TV and PEO TV) or on Rupavahini (terrestrial).
